name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 6, in Yan'an, Shaanxi, a K7 bus caught fire at the Erzhuangke bus stop in Baota District. After the fire was put out, only an iron frame remained on the bus. There was no one on the bus when the fire broke out, and the cause of the fire is currently unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Guangdong Yangjiang police reported: A man occupied the emergency lane and did not give way to special vehicles, and his driver's license was deducted 9 points and fined 300 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 6, a passenger said that he encountered a policeman at Kunming Airport who demanded a bribe of 100 yuan "for cigarettes".
It is reported that the passenger flew to South Korea at Kunming Changshui Airport on the 6th. A border inspection policeman said that he needed to report his trip during the National Day holiday. If he did not report, he would have to pay 100 yuan "to buy a pack of cigarettes for his leader." Because it was close to the departure time, he gave it, and other people who followed him encountered the same situation.
Kunming Border Inspection responded that it was the behavior of the public security of another province, and the person involved had been taken away

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: There are also various registration strategies on Xiaohongshu. Usually, the registration targets are people who have worked in the system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 7, at the MotoGP Japan Motegi Station, QJMOTOR team's European rider Gonzalez wore a traditional Japanese headband during the race, and the team's sponsor Qianjiang Motorcycle asked the team to terminate its cooperation with him. The reason was that although he was a European rider and his actions were unintentional, he had already hurt the national sentiments of Chinese riders and the Chinese people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Yu Miao asked the police: Do you really believe that what you did, closing down a humanities bookstore like Jifeng, is right?
One of the policemen who seemed quite "skilled" answered: You can imagine all this as a scene from the novel "1984".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 7, a knife-wounding incident occurred near the Shijiazhuang Passenger Transport Center Station. According to insiders, the man was a local taxi driver who committed the crime after a dispute with others over a fare.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hong Kong also needs to take ideological and political courses. Netizens submitted the "Citizenship and Social Development" textbook for Hong Kong high schools. It is reported that from 2021, the original General Education subject will be renamed "Citizenship and Social Development Subject". The purpose of this subject is to help students build a broad knowledge base through learning about topics related to Hong Kong, the country and the contemporary world, cultivate students' national identity, and have a global perspective. They can also cultivate multi-angle thinking by studying different topics in the fields of economy, science, technology, environmental protection, sustainable development, public health, etc., and master the roles and interactive relationships of individuals, society, the country and the world in various fields.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a report on a rape case in Donggang City signed by the Public Security Bureau of Donggang City, Liaoning Province, has been circulated online and attracted attention. The report mentioned that the victim in the case was a student of Donggang City No. 3 Senior High School, and the suspect was the Dean of Academic Affairs of Donggang City No. 3 Senior High School. The police have opened the case as a rape investigation, and the relevant details and other evidence materials of the case are being further examined.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 7, the Wall Street Journal reported that for months or longer, the networks of many broadband providers in the United States have been under attack by Chinese hackers. The large-scale intrusion was carried out by a sophisticated Chinese hacker group called "Salt Typhoon". People familiar with the matter said that the group appeared to be gathering intelligence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 7, the Wall Street Journal published a long article analyzing that the sharp decline in venture capital funds flowing into Chinese start-ups is prompting the Chinese government to get more involved in cultivating its own technology industry, but in the long run, this strategy may not be conducive to China's technological catch-up with the West.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 7, the results of the 2024 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine were announced. The American duo Ambrose and Ruff Quinn won the award for their discovery of microRNA, a new type of small RNA molecule that plays a key role in gene regulation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 7, Bloomberg published a long article reporting on the impact of the high tariffs imposed by the United States on Chinese trailer chassis. The tariff policy is intended to reduce dependence on Chinese manufacturing and protect the US domestic manufacturing industry, but it has also led to higher prices for Chinese products, reduced imports, and prominent supply chain problems, affecting local companies and employment. Pitts, a local US company

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 7, this account posted a message admitting that the incident was fabricated.
